title: How to Control the Pets on the Sims 2 Pets

steps.title: Enter your game.
steps.content: Enter your game. You can be in the neighborhood or enter a household.

steps.title: Press Ctrl+⇧ Shift+C.
steps.content: Press Ctrl + ⇧ Shift + C . A small box will appear at the top of the screen; this is the cheat window.

steps.title: Type boolprop controlpets on and press ↵ Enter.
steps.content: Type boolprop controlpets on and press ↵ Enter . This cheat allows you to direct dogs and cats to perform actions.

steps.title: Enable action-canceling if you choose.
steps.content: Enable action-canceling if you choose. If you want to be able to cancel a pet's actions, press Ctrl + ⇧ Shift + C , type boolprop petactioncancel true , and press ↵ Enter .

steps.title: Play as your pets.
steps.content: Play as your pets. Once you've enabled both cheats, you can control cats and dogs the same way as you'd control Sims.
